img_summary: The image depicts a lone warrior facing three colossal, armored figures in a misty, ethereal landscape. The warrior is poised with a long staff, suggesting readiness for confrontation or a significant challenge. The preceding text "# Prologue" indicates that this scene sets the stage for the narrative, introducing a pivotal moment or conflict that will unfold in the story. The document title "Prologue" reinforces the idea that this image serves as an introductory visual to the broader tale.
